TopicTitle: What visual mods are currently working on RSS/RO with ksp 1.3?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys! recently i started playing with RSS/RO and after the initial catastrophic mistakes i am loving it. The problem is, it looks like crap. What can i do to improve it visually? i see screenshots and videos that really look amazing!

I am using ksp 1.3.x since CKAN said RSS/RO are updated for this version. Hardware is not a problem. Bonus points if whatever you suggest can be installed via CKAN!

Thank you all!

I am using some files from RSSVE and some from RSSVE-Lite. But if Hardware is not a problem you could try just the RSSVE which is better looking. Also there is other mod called extremeTextures for RSS also but I don't know if you can make it run on 1.3.1 You should try.
